title: Has the new report system actually made any changes?

replies.body: yes and no it dose get rid of toxic players but they can just make a new account and ever time they get punished they are more careful
Don't think so. Monumental fail and waste of time/money spent implementing it.

It's probably too early to say. 

I did get that message that someone had been punished as a result of our reports. It was only once so far. 

Any one else get that message? How many times?
who cares about our opinions its not up to us, and we'll never truly know since rito likes to keep their experimentation of maximising profits with continual play and minimal punishment optimally
